name: Kophje
culture_notes: Coastal Tongues dialect with Riveric loanwords
ancestor offerings fused into daily fishing rites
constraints: Ritual magic requires scarce imported reagents
Long-range mind influence is rare and institutionally banned
No high-pressure steam megatechs; limited combustion industry
notes: Population unknown; functions as coastal waypoint and minor port
Likely a hub for ritual reagent trade and clandestine goods
